mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (user_id, content, category, created_by, updated_by) VALUES(#{userId}, #{content}, #{category}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy})
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.content, b.category, b.likes, b.views, b.created_at, b.created_by, u.id as user_id, u.nickname as writer FROM board b, user u WHERE b.user_id = u.id ORDER BY b.id DESC

SELECT b.id, b.content, b.category, b.likes, b.views, b.created_at, b.created_by, u.id as user_id, u.nickname as writer FROM board b, user u WHERE b.user_id = u.id ORDER BY b.id DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT b.id, b.content, b.category, b.likes, b.views, b.created_at, b.created_by, u.id as user_id, u.nickname as writer FROM board b, user u WHERE b.user_id = u.id AND b.id = #{id}

SELECT b.id, b.content, b.category, b.likes, b.views, b.created_at, b.created_by, u.id as user_id, u.nickname as writer FROM board b, user u WHERE b.user_id = u.id AND b.category = #{category} ORDER BY b.id DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET content = #{content}, category = #{category}, updated_at = NOW(), updated_by = "server1" WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
